If she doesnt seem comfortable engaging in sexual activity due to these flashbacks then maybe its for the best you dont engage.. If it is her genuinely wanting to participate, then I would say take it very slowly, step at a time. Spend a while doing one very mellow sexual activity, if shes comfortable then you can build up over time until she gets to a point where that relationship with you doesnt hurt her. Make sure she has control during every second, so if she says stop, she trusts that you will stop. If she says to slow down or take it down a notch, do so immediately. If shes too scared to say something, check in every now and then and ask her if shes doing okay.

You can't compare disliking a fetish community with racism. And I TRIED to tell them I was underage and they wip their genitals out and tell me to call them daddy. I am still a child, am I expected to be okay with a sexual community that's mistreated me?

Holy heck that is a stretch. My experiences are with a fetish community as /a child./ When people tell me to my face that the things that have happened to me are sexy then I am going to crinkle my nose when I see people who are okay with that fetish.

Based on how people in the ddlg community have treated me before, that's the only way I can see it. I'm sorry if that offends you and that's as much as I'll say if you don't want to discuss it, but that's where I stand

Well, either way, my post is about sexual people in the ddlg community. As for power exchange, I don't care if people are excited by that, but personally for myself, seeing people sexualize children makes me feel overwhelmingly disgusted and upset. I came here to rant about that, that's it

just because someone might happen to post nsfw content doesnt mean they might be harmful. It might not even be sexual content, it could just be content they consider triggering to some people or they are over 18 and they want to ensure theres no confusion. Either way, as long as they arent trying to make moves on you, its okay to make friends who have that in their lives...

as long as it isnt, like, ddlg, and theyre taking advantage of a group strictly for coping. Its also your choice of course, I'm under 18 and dont post nsfw content, thats just how I see it..

take pictures of your wounds and living situations, and have somebody you know call cps for you, because the system helps people who can't call for themselves first even if its urgent. If you really had to kill him it would easily be self defense. Cps tries to keep family together so you're likely to stay with another family member before foster care. I've been through the removal process and I can take you through every step in my pms if you need support. Its terrifying, but a year later I've never been happier and I want that for you too
All you have to do is explain the difference :) you use it as a coping mechanism and it helps keep you calm and happy, and that's it, nothing more

I can't guarantee this is good advice, but when I need to sleep, I don't focus on me needing to sleep. I'll put on a quiet, slow-paced youtube video and distract myself with that until my eyes get too heavy to open again and I'm asleep. If a night light would help, you could day dream about intricate, detailed stories, and just focus on how great that story is instead of thinking of the pain and how bad you want to sleep. It's easier said than done, but that's my method
